page.title: 15CHERRY BURTON-SEAMAN 2
page.content: as Chief Officer of the Norland when she was requisitioned to carry the 2nd Battalion the Parachute Regiment to the Falklands.I saw action there as the Norland was used as an Assault Ship during the initial landing phase. She was in fact the first ship to enter San Carlos water during the landing,suffering 4 days of heavy air attacks before proceeding unescorted to S.Georgia to meet the QE2 and bring units of the Guards and Gurkhas back to the Falklands.After the Argentinian defeat,we made 2 runs with prisoners of war; to Montevideo(Uruguay)and Puerto Madryn(Argentina).I took over as captain for 2 months while Norland ferried troops between Ascension and Pt.Stanley.In 1983 as Capt.of Norwave we suffered a major fire and since as Chief Officer Norland damaged her Port Stabiliser flooding the engine room.
